overview: A bad workman always blames his tools – but rest assured there’s no danger of any poor workmanship in this flick. All the boys know exactly what to do with the equipment that nature gave them, and it’s no time at all before they’re using their thick, uncut cocks to maximum effect. No ass is safe, no mouth unused, and none of these lads are satisfied until every hole is banged!
tagline: Boys will be Boys... Hard Tools brings you sexy hard-bodied ladz doing all the things you like to see ripped guys do. Don't miss the excitement.
title: Hard Tools
